definition[0]: a part of a coat, jacket etc that you can pull up to cover your head
example[0]: Why don’t you put your hood up if you’re cold?
definition[1]: a cloth bag that goes over someone’s face and head so that they cannot be recognized or cannot see
example[1]: He was abducted by four men wearing hoods.
definition[2]: the metal covering over the engine on a car
example[2]: Check under the hood and see what that noise is.
definition[3]: a cover fitted above a cooker to remove the smell of cooking
definition[4]: a folding cover on a car or pram, which gives protection from the rain
definition[7]: used to refer to a period of time or a state
example[3]: during his childhood  (=when he was a child)
example[4]: parenthood  (=the state of being a parent)
definition[8]: the people who belong to a particular group
example[5]: the priesthood  (=all the people who are priests)
